sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext } from "react" import { CartContext } from "../Context/CartContext" export function CartItem(props) { const { increaseQuantity, decreaseQuantity, removeCartItem } = useContext(CartContext) // convert cents to dollars props.price = props.price / 100 return (

{props.title}

{props.description}

quantity:

{props.quantity}

${(props.quantity * props.price).toFixed(2)}

) }
